Package edu.purdue.dtf

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BoardListener
    BoardListener is implemented on objects that need to do something whenever something important happens in the core game logic, such as a piece being moved.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Board provides the basic game grid and is responsible for all the core game logic.
    GameActivity
    GameActivity is responsible for the basic Android wrapper of the game.
    GameView
    GameView takes care of drawing and receiving user input.
    Piece
    Piece is the superclass of the various unit types that the player controls in the game.
    Position
    Position is a set of grid coordinates for a particular board on the square.
    Unit
    Units the actual pieces each player controls.
